column4: What do i add to the grub to make it boot to text mode so far i changed GRUB_TERMINAL=console #GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX_DEFAULT=""
I dont have a line that mentions text so i guess i do GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX_DEFAULT=text ?
By "text mode" do you mean "booting to a terminal prompt" or "using VGA-text output rather than a graphical mode"?
to a terminal prompt with no gui
